title: Help us improve the Summoner Showcase!

embed.description: We're making some changes to the Summoner Showcase and we need your help! Please answer the questions below and help us level up the Summoner Showcase!

body:
Summoners,

The Summoner Showcase Needs YOU..... to take a survey!

My name is Mathew, one of the producers behind the Summoner Showcase.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EYJxPgWmSvo&list=PLOYk3oZd8EOozNNpo6BEkeph3m7NYMEiD

We want to make some changes and give the show a fresh coat of paint, but we need your help!

Help us create a better Summoner Showcase in 2018 by taking this survey! It’s totally anonymous, so please give us honest feedback and help us make a show that you’ll love.

Thank you for your help! Share any other comments or suggestions you have in the thread.
